Colombia: Spanish explorer Juan de la Cosa lands on what is today called Cabo de la Vela (Cape of Sails) in the Guajira Peninsula
France: Charles VIII died. With no heir, he was succeeded by his father's second cousin, the Duke of Orléans, Louis XII.
India: Vasco de Gama's first voyage from Europe to India and back (to 1499)
Italy: The First Italian War ends in a victory for the League of Venice.
Kenya: Vasco da Gama reaches coastal Kenya
Tanzania: The Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama is the first known European to reach the East African coast, landing at Kilimane, where he stayed for 32 days.
